thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First class
thread.title_full: First class - Review of Premier Inn London Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LindaBBrighton
title: First class
text:
Stayed just the one Saturday night in March. Booked a few months ahead for bargain price of Â£53. Short distance from London Bridge Station and in the very vibrant Borough Market area.
Easy check in using touch screen which dispenses keys in seconds. But staff there if needed.
Room was large (with a sofa bed we didn't need). Spotlessly clean. Gorgeously comfy bed and a real bonus for me was the completely black out curtains - did not wake until 8.30! No noise at all to disturb sleep.
Proof that Premier Inns are providing what people want at an affordable price.
Highly recommend it here.
